safeai.hint: When FPGA is connected, the compute path flips to Hybrid (Hardware-backed) and each answer is tagged with provenance.

alert.no_serial: Web Serial not supported. You can still use software fallback.
alert.handshake_fail: Device handshake failed. Staying in software fallback.
alert.connect_fail: Could not connect to FPGA. Staying in software fallback.
